text: It's not about routine, it's more about getting things done.
author: Vardaan Patel

text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

text: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
author: Stephen King

text: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of commitment to excellence.
author: Paul J. Meyer

text: Small daily improvements lead to stunning results over time.
author: Robin Sharma

text: What gets measured gets managed.
author: Peter Drucker

text: Lost time is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Don’t confuse motion with progress.
author: Unknown

text: Your future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.
author: Anonymous

text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

text: Simplicity boils down to two steps: Identify the essential. Eliminate the rest.
author: Leo Babauta

text: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

text: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
author: Dale Carnegie

text: Great acts are made up of small deeds.
author: Lao Tzu

text: Ordinary people think merely of spending time, great people think of using it.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

text: You don’t have to be extreme, just consistent.
author: Unknown

text: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

text: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali
